document_data.name: ''Shadow-Cloaked Ring''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow-cloaked ring''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]] imbued with shadow magics.
document_data.Description: Despite its gilded appearance,''shadow-cloaked ring'' never gleamed as if constantly in shadow.
document_data.Powers: The ring's ''shadowthief'' enchantment increased all damage the wearer did to targets obscured by shade or darkness.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''shadow-cloaked ring'' was found on a powerful [[shadow mastiff]] who led a pack within the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] of the [[Western Heartlands]]. The same pack that hounded [[True Soul]] [[Korliss]] leading to the cultist's death of hunger.
